TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Title extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class Title Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IDisposable
type Title = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示整个图表图像的标题。

span.span: Represents a title for the entire chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装控件标题的所有功能 。The class encapsulates all the functionality of a title for the control. 此类是使用 根对象的集合属性公开的 。This class is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 整个图表图像可以有任意数量的标题。There can be any number of titles for an entire chart image. 标题能够：Titles are able to: - 停靠、对齐或自定义定位。Be docked and aligned or custom-positioned. - 显示在绘制的图表区的内部或外部。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 使用预定义的 ，如 或 。Use a predefined such as or . - 使用阴影、渐变颜色和背景图像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 调整大小并放置在图表图像中的任意位置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，用于显示标题的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of the title.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果为背景指定了渐变颜色，则该值将为第一个使用的颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制颜色的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为 "透明"-也就是说，如果使用的 alpha 值为0，则不会将颜色分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - that is, if you use an alpha value of 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此，背景将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景渐变方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示标题的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定标题是否将显示渐变，并确定渐变的方向（如果使用）。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: 用属性设置标题背景的主要颜色 。Set the primary color of the title background with the property. 用属性设置标题背景的辅助颜色 。Set the secondary color of the title background with the property. 将此 属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的阴影类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举，指定标题的阴影样式。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定类型的画笔使用的阴影模式 。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影模式包含纯色背景色和在背景上绘制的线条。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用阴影样式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **注意** 阴影线的颜色由 属性确定。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义标题背景图像的路径 ，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a title, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用 和 属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 还可以通过设置属性，将图像显示的一种颜色指定为 "透明" 。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像是 .NET Framework 支持的任何有效图形文件，包括图标。An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be drawn as transparent when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 一个指定颜色的 值，当绘制背景图像时，该颜色将被绘制为透明色。

span.span: A value that specifies the color that will be drawn as transparent when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现图表时，此颜色将显示为透明。This color will be displayed as transparent when the chart is rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标题背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定该标题的背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定图像的显示方式; 图像可以平铺、缩放等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，则该图像将进行拉伸以适合标题边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the title. 如果图像已平铺，则从标题的左上角开始，重复绘制图像。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the title. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅 枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则绘制图像的位置由 属性设置确定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the title background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性是多个相关属性中的一个，用于确定对象的辅助背景色 ，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以设置 为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则 属性将确定标题的阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the title. 若要为标题背景使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for the background of a title: - 用属性设置主色 。Set the primary color with the property. - 用属性设置辅助颜色 。Set the secondary color with the property. - 将 属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以停靠到整个图表图像的顶部、左侧、底部或右侧，或者位于图表区域的内部或外部。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则停靠适用于整个图表图像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则停靠适用于 属性指定的对象 If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 如果 属性未设置为，则此属性不起作用 。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置指定标题是否应停靠于 对象之内的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the title should be docked within a object.

value.span: 如果标题将在图表区域内停靠，则为 ；如果标题将在图表区域外停靠，则为 。

span.span: if the title will be docked within a chart area; if the title will be docked outside the chart area.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则将标题停靠到绘制的图表区的外部边缘; 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则标题将停靠在图表区的内部边缘。If the property is set to `false`, the title is docked to the outside edge of the plotted chart areas; if this property is set to `true`, the title will be docked to the inside edge of the chart area. 如果对象的名称未分配给该属性，则此属性将不起作用 。This property will have no effect if the name of a object is not assigned to the property. **注意** 仅当属性设置为时，此行为才适用 。**Note** This behavior only applies if the property is set to . 如果不是这种情况，则设置 属性将不起作用，因为标题的位置由 属性值决定。If this is not the case, setting the property has no effect, because the position of the title is then determined by the property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题对象的名称必须唯一;否则，将引发异常。The name of a title object must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 从对象中检索对象时，此属性可用作索引器 。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果将此属性设置为长度为零的字符串，则会引发异常。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该 属性为自动 (即 title. Auto = `true`) 则控件自动计算标题位置 ， 并考虑 和 属性设置。If the property is automatic (that is, Title.Position.Auto = `true`) the title position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings. 如果不是自动的，则 会忽略、和属性，并且标题位置仅由返回对象的值确定 。If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the title position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color for the title.

span.span: A value that specifies the shadow color for the title.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现 "真实" 阴影效果;对于阴影，尝试使用颜色值 "128，0，0，0"。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，请将 属性设置为非零值 (0) 。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏，请将此属性设置为非零的值 (0) 。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下和向右移动;负值将导致阴影向左移动和向左移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的文本样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定标题的文本样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题文本有五种可能的样式： 、 、 、 和 。There are five possible styles for title text: , , , , and . 请参阅下表，了解以下样式的摘要：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |StyleStyle|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |默认Default|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示，无其他效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color, with no additional effects.| |ShadowShadow|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示，并对文本添加阴影效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color with an added shadow effect on the text.| |EmbossEmboss|使用所需的字体和颜色显示文本，但使用浮雕效果绘制。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embossing effect.| |EmbedEmbed|使用所需的字体和颜色显示文本，但使用嵌入效果进行绘制。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embedding effect.| |FrameFrame|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示，但以文本的轮廓的形式显示，即，无填充。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn as an outline of the text, that is, with no fill.|
